Comments_List: This course helped me further my calculus knowledge by introducing me to mathematics in 3D space and vector calculus.
I learned Multivariable and Vector Calculus
Calculus of several variables, which helped us to know more about differentiation.
I thought this course was very well designed and clear.
The greatest strength of this course was the small class size and the frequent office hours scheduled.

Strength is that it is really suitable for those who want to have math as their major in the future. Weakness maybe the course is a little bit too quick(but that may also because it is an intensive course in five weeks)
If you are planning to take higher level math or are a STEM major of any sort, I would highly recommend taking this comprehensive course.
Absolutely. This class was well-taught and provides essential information and knowledge for anyone wishing to pursue a STEM major.
Yes, I would recommend. Because it is very useful, and instructor is knowledgable.
